result.name: brownfield-register-lancaster-city-council-2019
result.notes:
The Council republished its brownfield land register data on the 17th June 2019. The register will be uploaded annually.

The data identifies 32 brownfield sites, all of the sites on the register are included in our Strategic Housing and Employment Land Availability Assessment (SHELAA).

The Brownfield Land Register included brownfield land that accords with the NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) definition and the following criteria: 0.25 ha / 5 dwellings or more -- (1 dwelling or more within the Areas of Outstanding Natural Beauty (AONBs) at Arnside & Silverdale and The Forest of Bowland).
result.title: Brownfield Register Lancaster City Council 2019
